reviews.text: Appartement charmant et proche de toutes commodités. Véronique a été très réactive malgré ma réservation tardive.
reviews.name: Sandrine

reviews.text: Aveuli parfait . Logement très propre et parfaitement adapte pour 2 personnes. À recommander.
reviews.name: Gilles

reviews.text: Très bel appartement, cosy dans un des plus beaux et anciens quartiers de Paris. Très bien équipé et très agréable.
reviews.name: Emmanuelle

reviews.text: Petit studio... très bien situé .... charmant ... bien pour une personne ou un couple .... beaucoup d attention pour rendre le séjour agréable... idéalement situé au cœur d un quartier historique charmant et culturel
reviews.name: Yasser

reviews.text: Really great communication with the owners prior to and during our stay. Very clean and comfortable. Stocked with all the important things. Loved the neighborhood. So close to everything. Walkable to metro stops, bars, restaurants and sites. Great place.
reviews.name: Molly

reviews.text: Really nice location in the Latin Quarter. Somewhat noisy at night - but at the same time lively and fun!
reviews.name: Don

reviews.text: Francois et Veronique's place was more than we expected, so close to Boulevarde St Michel and on a street full of life. It was compact but comfortable for my son and I. Very clean and easily accessible. The information provided was very comprehensive and, if needed, we had a number to call to reach them. We had a very enjoyable stay.
reviews.name: Terry

reviews.text:
The apartment was in the perfect location to walk everywhere or catch the metro a block away. It was comfortable and sparkling clean. We were met by the most delightful Houda, she gave us a tour of the apartment and walked us to the grocery store a few blocks away. It was the perfect way to begin our vacation in Paris. Communication with Francois Et Veronique was excellent before, during and after the stay. We highly recommend! Make sure to peek out the window to the left, the Eiffel Tower is in view, twinkling in the hour after 10.
+ Plus
reviews.name: Denise

reviews.text: This little New York style apartment is great to stay in to explore the real Paris. The apartment is easy to get to and in the heart of the city. Walking distance to all of the monuments and attractions in the city. Francois and Veronique were wonderful host and always were there to help with anything. Defiantly will stay agin if I am ever in Paris!
reviews.name: Nick

reviews.text: Hard to find but a great value.
reviews.name: Ricky

reviews.text: Great location near Saint-Germain and the Latin Quarter. Small but efficient apartment in the heart of the city, everything you need! We loved waking up and being able to make coffee in the mornings before heading out for the day.
reviews.name: Yuki

reviews.text:
The place is very convenient from both Airports and what I like is that there are plenty of nice cafe and restuarant. Also if you like walking, you can actually work to a lots of places from this apartment. We did few explore around the area and we liked it. The place is clean and big enough for 3 people. Also, owner provides bottle of water and little madeline for the welcome. However, the only down side of this place is that there is no lift or elevator as the building is old. However, it doesn't effect much to us. We consider climbing up stairs as an exercise. Also the host answers and provide all information really quick. We like this place and will definitely recommend our friends.
+ Plus
reviews.name: Marisa

reviews.text: We loved our 4 day stay here. It's a lovely apartment in a great and central area, and Francois, Veronique and Houda went out of their way to make sure we were well looked after. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.name: Rachael

reviews.text: Wonderful in every way. Eminently walkable for most of Paris, with good food close by as well. A great place to come at the end of a long day. Kitchen and Nescafe a great bonus.
reviews.name: Tassy

reviews.text: Excellent apartment, excellent hosts. [Insert any positive comment, they all apply].
reviews.name: Emil

reviews.text:
We were three girls staying at François and Veroniques place for a weekend, and we had the most wonderful stay in their lovely apartment. The housekeeper Houda welcomed us and told us everything that we needed to know for our stay. The location was the best part, it was close to everything with a lot of cute creperies and restaurants within walking distance and you could actually see the Eiffeltower from the window. Although the neighborhood was lively, the windows were well soundproofed which made our nightsleep very pleasant. Furthermore, the baathroom was very fresh, a small but functional kitchen if you want to cook your dinner by yourself. During our weekend, François et Veronique continually checked that we were having a good time and that we were welcome to ask them anything that we wanted. We gladly recommend you to visit this cute apartment and enjoy a few days in Paris.
+ Plus
reviews.name: Emilia

reviews.text: Francois could not have been easier to work with. Responsive, timely and made us feel very comfortable. The location can't be beat! If you are looking to embrace the Parisian culture, we highly recommend staying at this place. Everything about it made us feel like we were in the best
reviews.name: Ashley

reviews.text: François' apartment was beautiful and in a wonderful location. He made it easy to find and access. Along with any amenities needed like we were in a hotel. We didn't get to stay the full 2 nights we requested due to wrongly made travel arrangements but François was kind and understanding! Thanks you F&V your apartment was wonderful!
reviews.name: Diana

reviews.text: If you're coming to Paris and looking for a great convenient spot, this is it! Minutes from most museums, great shops and restaurants seconds away. A wonderful experience and I recommend it to anyone!
reviews.name: David

reviews.text: Fantastic experience; great place and fantastic location!
reviews.name: José Miguel

reviews.text: It was a wonderful and cozy apartment to stay in. Couldn't imagine something better. It close to the majority of sightseeing. This arrondissement de Paris is truly French with an unforgettable atmosphere and delicious restaurant close to the apartment.
reviews.name: Anna

reviews.text: We were greeting graciously and given great tips on where to go for drinks and food around the area. There is a lot to do within walking distance and no more than a €10-€15 taxi to all the major sites. The apartment is stocked with coffee and all the necessities. Definitely would stay again.
reviews.name: Aimee

reviews.text: We just loved the apartment! It's super bright and you have a really nice view on the streets Saint Germain. When you look down the street, you can even see the Eifel Tower! <3 The apartment was spotless, the decor very chic and the beds super comfy! We would love to stay with these lovely and helpful hosts again!
reviews.name: Grace

reviews.text: This apartment is amazing! The fotos don't live up to this charming and perfectly located listing. We enjoyed the lively Saint-Germain and were surprised that all major sights as Notre-Dame, Louvre and the Pantheon are just a few minutes away. Also the location is great to shop and enjoy authentic Parisian cafes and restaurants. Even the sofa bed was surprisingly comfortable! When we come back, we will definitely rent this apartment again!
reviews.name: Leo

reviews.text:
We had a wonderful stay at this lovely flat in Paris. Francois and Veronique were the best hosts we ever met! The communication with us before and during our stay was just perfect, which made us feel very welcome. They were always extremely quick to respond whenever I contacted them. I can't say enough about how helpful they were! The place is exactly how it looks on the pictures, very comfortable and cozy. It had everything you need for an amazing stay in Paris (they provided coffee, water, soaps, etc). There are stores on the street if you want to stock the kitchen. The location is absolutely perfect and the decoration is amazing. Kitchen and bathroom are beautiful as well and spotlessly clean as all the apartment. The bed is very comfortable. It's a perfect place for two or three people (there is a kingsize bed and a pull-out bed for a further person). Very central and on a quiet street because there are no cars, only people walking around. You get a nice feeling for real Parisian life and you are able to walk to most everything you'll want to see. Very nice restaurants, bars and cafés are around. Furthermore the Saint-Germain area is one of the most beautiful in Paris. You can't find a better place! We loved it! Thanks a lot!
+ Plus
reviews.name: R
